verses.text: \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*: for \add it is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* to sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* unto our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; for \add it is\add* \w pleasant|strong="H5273"\w*; \add and\add* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* is \w comely|strong="H5000"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* doth build \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: he gathereth \w together|strong="H3664"\w* the \w outcasts|strong="H1760"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

He \w healeth|strong="H7495"\w* the \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and bindeth \w up|strong="H2280"\w* their \w wounds|strong="H6094"\w*.\f + \fr 147.3 \ft wounds: Heb. griefs\f*
He \w telleth|strong="H4487"\w* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w*; he \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* them all by \add their\add* \w names|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w Great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* our \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*, and of \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*: his \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* \add is\add* \w infinite|strong="H4557"\w*.\f + \fr 147.5 \ft his…: Heb. of his understanding there is no number\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* lifteth \w up|strong="H5749"\w* the \w meek|strong="H6035"\w*: he \w casteth|strong="H8213"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w down|strong="H8213"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Sing|strong="H6030"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*; sing \w praise|strong="H2167"\w* upon the \w harp|strong="H3658"\w* unto our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

Who \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* with \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w*, who \w prepareth|strong="H3559"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* for the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, who maketh \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* to \w grow|strong="H6779"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.

He \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* his \w food|strong="H3899"\w*, \add and\add* to the \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w ravens|strong="H6158"\w* which \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*.

He \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* not in the \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* of the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*: he taketh not \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* in the \w legs|strong="H7785"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* taketh \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* in them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him, in those that \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* in his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.
\w Praise|strong="H7623"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, O \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

For he hath \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* of thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; he hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* thee.

He \w maketh|strong="H7760"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add in\add* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*, \add and\add* \w filleth|strong="H7646"\w* thee with the \w finest|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*.\f + \fr 147.14 \ft He…: Heb. Who maketh thy border peace\f*\f + \fr 147.14 \ft finest…: Heb. fat of wheat\f*

He sendeth \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w commandment|strong="H0565"\w* \add upon\add* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: his \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w runneth|strong="H7323"\w* very \w swiftly|strong="H4120"\w*.
He \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* like \w wool|strong="H6785"\w*: he \w scattereth|strong="H6340"\w* the \w hoarfrost|strong="H3713"\w* like \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*.
He casteth \w forth|strong="H7993"\w* his \w ice|strong="H7140"\w* like \w morsels|strong="H6595"\w*: who can \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w cold|strong="H7135"\w*?

He sendeth \w out|strong="H7971"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w melteth|strong="H4529"\w* them: he causeth his \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* to \w blow|strong="H5380"\w*, \add and\add* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w flow|strong="H5140"\w*.

He \w sheweth|strong="H5046"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w* unto \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, his \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and his \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 147.19 \ft his word: Heb. his words\f*

He hath not \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* so with any \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*: and \add as for his\add* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, they have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* them. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*.
